item.title: Accessing Couchbase from Scala
item.description: In my recent adventure on exploring both Couchbase and Scala, I noticed that there are not many tutorials out there using both at the same time. We’ll use the couchbase-java driver in its latest version (1.1), because it provides support for views and Couchbase 2.0. Note that I won’t cover installing Couchbase here, since there is plenty of material out there. Also, I assume you have scala and sbt already installed.
